title: PymApp
description: PymApp is an app that brings small businesses closer to any user interested in their products in a fast, comfortable and intuitive way. Thanks to PymApp anyone can discover the best prices and new establishments in a single space.

title: ToDo_meter
description: A meter to-do list built with Android Jetpack (Room, ViewModel, LiveData, Databinding, ViewBinding, Paging...)

title: Weather Station IoT
description: Weather Station IoT in a system developed using Google Cloud IoT Core, Cloud Firestore, Mongoose OS & Android Jetpack. This development works as a first contact with Google Cloud IoT and Mongoose OS. Many Android Jetpack components (LiveData, ViewModel, ...) and interesting things of this framework are used to build the Frontend of the system.

title: Kinect Video Player
description: The Kinect Video Player allows you to watch videos and be controlled remotely by the user through gestures and actions. Once the video starts playing, it can be paused, played, or restarted. At the bottom a timeline corresponding to different moments of the video appears. It can be controlled by gestures. By sliding left or right, you can increase and decrease the volume, and by making a circle with your left hand you can go back 10 seconds.

title: Mr Musicphile - Actions on Google
description: Mr Musicphile is an agent to find information about artists, lyrics, artists songs that contain a specific word, songs by feels and songs by genres. Developed using Dialogflow and Cloud Functions.
